title: Erikson on Erikson on the Community
creator_credit: Parents' Magazine Films and Thomas Sand
brief_description: This is edited from filmed and recorded conversation between Erik Erikson and students. He talks about the community and its place in modern society Credits include: production manager-Carl Zucker; photographer-Stephen Bower; editor-Laurence Solomon; sound-Jeffrey Hayes
